description: This file defines a custom exception class named InsufficientFundsException for handling insufficient funds errors within the banking application. It extends a base exception class called SimpleBankingGlobalException.

classes.name: InsufficientFundsException
classes.description: A custom exception class used to indicate that an account has insufficient funds for a transaction. It extends the SimpleBankingGlobalException class.

methods.name: InsufficientFundsException
methods.description: Constructor that initializes an InsufficientFundsException with a message and error code.
